definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua

sentences.english: BMW still trails Audi as the top luxury car brand in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，宝马依然不敌奥迪头号豪华车品牌的地位。

sentences.english: The house in which I live is rather magnificient .
sentences.chinese: 我所住的房屋相当豪华。

sentences.english: Plush leather, matte-finish tactile buttons: quality craftsmanship.
sentences.chinese: 舒适豪华的皮革，磨砂触觉按钮:高品质工艺。

sentences.english: Already be the luxurious go-anywhere vehicle that money buys with helping Tibet all on the road.
sentences.chinese: 马路上已经满是用援藏款买的豪华越野车。

sentences.english: These luxurious and soft egyptian cotton hipsters are great in both comfort and support.
sentences.chinese: 豪华柔软的埃及棉，能提供最好的舒适度与支持度。

sentences.english: The luxury naturist holiday spot opened its doors earlier this year.
sentences.chinese: 这家豪华的矿泉疗养旅馆在今年早些时候已经开业。

sentences.english: I say to you, only the enlightened person can live luxuriously.
sentences.chinese: 我跟你说，只有悟道的人可以过的豪华。

sentences.english: Then we lounged through many and many a sumptuous private mansions.
sentences.chinese: 我们被领进一个豪华的餐厅。

sentences.english: This is the opulence of the twin suites layout… a temple of your supreme status.
sentences.chinese: 豪华双套房设计，彰显豪迈气派，倍添矜贵身价。

sentences.english: Unique and luxurious design with gold plated PCB, jacks and metal bracket.
sentences.chinese: 独特的设计和豪华镀金电路板，千斤顶和金属支架。

sentences.english: Imagine preparing a five-course dinner for the most distinguished palates in the world.
sentences.chinese: 想象一下，为世界上最豪华的味觉盛宴准备五道正菜。

sentences.english: The Phaeton was VW's uberluxe sedan.
sentences.chinese: 辉腾是大众的超级豪华四门轿车。

sentences.english: The hotel is designed and built against more than 4-star standard, luxury and comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 酒店按4星以上标准进行设计建设，豪华舒适。

sentences.english: This is a VIP room, it's cheaper than the deluxe room.
sentences.chinese: 这是一间贵宾房，比豪华房便宜一些。

sentences.english: Unique and decadent, The Seagate Hotel & Spa is a luxury Delray Beach resort.
sentences.chinese: 独特的希捷酒店是一家豪华德尔雷海滩度假胜地。

sentences.english: The story of the " unsinkable " luxury liner Titanic has fascinated people for nearly a century.
sentences.chinese: 人们对永不沉没的泰坦尼克号豪华轮着迷近一个世纪。

definition: one's own car (or motorbike)/vehicle for one's private use
